All of this falls under the "Don't be a shmuck" rule of entrepreneurship (and life).
Think about how you can GIVE to investors and not only how you can TAKE.
Otherwise, investing = I pay you to call me with your problems.
Pisses me off when you call to ask for help but not when you have something to offer back as a nice gesture.
Entrepreneurs: if you call an value-add investor for help, you also should call before a round closes to offer a piece of round.

#f8 takeaway.
Say bye to dreaming big. 
Say hello to better serving users, developers and advertisers. 
(And let's make $$$)

Themes from #f8:
Platform that's reliable & stable.
Put people first.
And let's make $$$ together!!!!!
In a couple weeks Zuck turns 30. #f8
Next year's #f8 --> March 25, 2015. (Perfect for those of us with kids and spring breaks!)
First time FB will be helping devs to monetize for the first time in a real way. #f8
Advertisers married to targeting w new formats, all opened to devs. Sign up today at http://t.co/Un49AgFmSw. #f8.
FB's Deborah Liu talks about Target and Huffington Post working together through the Facebook Audience Network. #f8.
FB launches new mobile formats  ... banners, interstitials and NATIVE advertising. #f8
And today they announced the Facebook Audience Network ... developers can run FB ads and get paid. #f8
Advertisers coming to FB because of the targeting avail ... and then opening it up to demand. FB's Deborah Liu at #f8.
1M advertisers on FB, says FB's Deborah Liu #f8.
"Traditional advertising still works on mobile" FB's Deborah Liu at #f8, confirming that FB isn't trying to reinvent the wheel.
375M people play games on FB every month. $3B of transactions processed to date.
Next up ... Deborah Liu to talk about helping developers MONETIZE their apps. #f8
FB's engagement ads = retargeting using your own event data. @_ImeArchibong #f8
FB's new ads strategy: take what's working on the web and make it better by bringing their data to the table. @_ImeArchibong #f8
HUGE! You can now target people on FB based on THE ACTIONS they took in your app. @_ImeArchibong #f8
FB is launching a paid offering -- engagement ads -- letting you target people on FB and bring them BACK to your app. @_ImeArchibong #f8

FB Start
Bootstrap=$5K in free services (new cos)
Accelerate=$30K (startups with apps already)
Live today!
@_ImeArchibong #f8
A new program FB has put together FB Start -- $30K in free tools and services to get your apps off the ground. @_ImeArchibong #f8
FB launches Message Dialog to let you share privately with one or a few friends. Or enemies. @_ImeArchibong #f8
Like and Share Buttons used on 10M web sites today. Today FB launches MOBILE LIKE button. @_ImeArchibong #f8
FB's @_ImeArchibong now up ... heading up strategic partnerships for the company. Impressive dude and speaker.
http://t.co/GuN0Esra1J is live today. All open source. #f8
New API from FB translates web URL into mobile URLs. #f8
.@ilyasu announces APPLINKS - open standard to enable you to deep link between apps. #f8
Only in Silicon Valley can someone stand on a stage and say that the URL is beautiful. #f8
"The URL is just beautiful," says @ilyasu at #f8 ... and says it's a shame that the URL breaks down in mobile. #f8
FB launching a local data store that makes it easier to build apps that work OFFLINE (when you don't have connectivity). #f8
Parse has grown from 60K apps to 200K apps in the year since @ilyasu sold the company to FB. #f8
.@ilyasu on stage looks like a young @davemorin ... As the rest of us get older, FB speakers get younger each year. Ilya isn't even 30 yet.
Parse is being offered up to developers (again). 3 products - PARSE CORE, PARSE PUSH and PARSE ANALYTICS. @ilyasu
Now up --> @ilyasu (founder of @ParseIt) ... he obviously has been anointed the future face of FB's mobile development platform.
Zuck is talking about "PUTTING PEOPLE FIRST" #f8
Hassle free login that lets you sign-in anonymously WHILE letting you sync apps across devices with an anonymous user ID. #f8
Zuck just announced ANONYMOUS LOGIN --> even if you don't want the app to know who you are, you may want to use the app. this solves that.
"Everyone has to choose to share their own data with the app themselves," Zuck says. Your friends can no longer do it for you! #f8
FB is making it easier for users to manage their privacy settings with a new FB login, Zuck says. #f8
2 YEAR CORE API STABILITY GUARANTEE launches TODAY, Zuck says. #f8
"MOVE FAST WITH STABLE INFRA" is new mantra, Zuck says. #f8
Used to have a mantra "MOVE FAST AND BREAK THINGS," Zuck says. But realized that was slowing them down b/c they had to go back and fix. #f8
FB is managing more than HALF A TRILLION API calls a day and has increased performance by 40% over the past few years. #f8
Zuck says the platform he's launching today is what they've used to create a mobile-first business at Facebook. #f8
Facebook is building the "cross platform platform" - identity, sharing, push notifications, app installs, monetization. #f8
Zuck is talking about the silos of mobile - Apple, Android, MSFT, web ... #f8 No one has incentive to bridge the platforms.
1B mobile app installs to date on FB. #f8
F8 is starting. So excited. #f8 Will be all about BUILD, GROW, MONETIZING your mobile apps.
